changes.1: General - Deprecated files, HTML & JS code removal/fixups.
changes.2: General - Added localisation of site details for better site-wide maintainability.
changes.3: General - Numerous security & performance patches to help improve site responsiveness and safety.
changes.5: General - Source code has once again been cleaned up and reduced in size.
changes.6: General - San Andreas Penal Code links fixed, pointing to the correct thread.
changes.7: Impound Report Generator - Fixed vehicle plate hint to display correct message.

changes.1: General - Improved mobile device user-experience with appropriate scalings to content throughout the website.
changes.2: General - Small dark mode input field fixes.
changes.3: Sidebar - The sidebar now collapses on mobile devices.
changes.4: Sidebar - Updated menu item icons for LSPD, LSSD, and LSFD to their respective logos.
changes.5: Sidebar - Removed MDC Panel LSPD thread link.
changes.6: Footer - Updated the footer position and fixed visual bugs.

changes.1: General - MDC Panel Project has been made open-source. GitHub - MDC Panel
changes.2: Sidebar - Fixed bottom margin on toggle-able menus.
changes.3: General - San Andreas Penal Code references changed to just Penal Code.

changes.1: General - OpenGraph details updated. (Logo and URL fixes for when linking the site in Discord to display short previews.)
changes.2: Sidebar - The sidebar is now scrollable if content is overflown.
changes.3: Sidebar - Current version of the MDC Panel is now displayed on the Changelog link instead of underneath the logo.
changes.4: Traffic Report Generator - Tint level fix. (Credit: Humour for finding the bug.)
changes.5: Impound Report Generator - Initial commit. (Credit: Skent)
changes.6: Impound Report Generator - Form and report structure adjustments and multiple small fixes and tweaks in both back-end and visual code.

changes.1: General - Backend styling code optimisation.
changes.2: General - Animation delay changes.
changes.3: General - Session variables optimisation.
changes.5: Parking Ticket Generator - Title icon and evidence hint fixes.
changes.6: Paperwork Generators - Large backend update regarding processing and defaulting variables.

changes.1: Settings - Live visitor counter toggle option.
changes.2: Paperwork Generators - Main page recoded to display generators dynamically.
changes.3: Parking Ticket Generator - Initial release.
changes.4: Traffic Division Patrol Report Generator - Updated to the new format.
changes.5: Sidebar - Live visitor counter is now animated.

changes.1: General - Live visitor counter.
General - All select inputs have been updated visually and certain menus also now support search boxes.
changes.2: Paperwork Generators - Further backend code improvements to select menus.

changes.1: General - All form fill out pages are now secured with alert messages to prevent accidental tab closure.
changes.2: General - Fixed highlighting text whilst using Day Mode.
changes.3: General - Fixed Clock & Breadcrumb animations to be more consistent.

changes.1: General - Updated MDC Panel Logo.
changes.2: General - Added a Favicon.
changes.3: General - Site-wide visual overhaul.
changes.4: General - Reworked entire URL Routing system for neater links.
changes.7: General - Site Settings & Preferences added (Day/Night, Live Clock, Breadcrumb, Background Logo, Hints, Footer toggles & Clear Cookies.).
changes.9: Paperwork Generators - Reworked from the ground-up for code efficiency, error checking, variable defaulting, clutter reduction, and optimisation for upcoming projects.
changes.10: Arrest Report Generators - Reworked entire backend code regarding the arrest charges table. The table will now display on the generated arrest report page.
changes.11: Arrest & Traffic Report Generators - If the dashboard camera section is left empty, it will default to the following message instead No dashboard camera video or audio footage attached.
changes.12: Traffic Report Generator - Updated to be using the same JSON Penal Code file as the Arrest Report Generator.
changes.13: Traffic Division: Patrol Report Generator - Added tips and hints for input fields for clarity.

changes.1: Arrest Report Generator - All charges now read from one single JSON file instead of two separate files for data extraction when calculating charges and for selectable choices from a list.
changes.2: Charges - Fixed charge 116 showing the incorrect charge title.

changes.1: Penal Code - Updated all charges to the newest penal code update.
changes.2: Arrest Report Generator - Improved code.
changes.3: Arrest Charges Form - Fixed numerous icon spacing issues & removal of deprecated tooltip code.
changes.4: Arrest Charges Table - Added Court section to table.

changes.1: General - Error tracker fixed.
changes.2: Charges - Fixed times for charge 120. depending on offence count.

changes.1: Patrol Log Generator - Initial release.
changes.2: Street Guide - Added the LSPD Impound Lot to the map.

changes.1: Evidence Registration Log Generator - Initial release, left disabled until further notice.

changes.1: General - Added META tags for previewing purposes such as when posting Discord links.

changes.1: General - Website branding and name change to MDC.
changes.2: General - Website has been adjusted and accommodated for future projects and generators.
changes.3: General - Temporary switch to lightmode until a toggle is created.
changes.5: Paperwork Generators - Added prepending icons to many input fields for form fill outs.
changes.6: Paperwork Generators - Addition of tooltips on hover or on focus to replace small help texts to remove visible clutter.
changes.7: Paperwork Generators - Fixed a bug where the rank chooser would remember the user's rank for each added slot.

changes.1: Navigation Bar - Useful links and resources.
changes.2: Paperwork Generators - Make & Model section swapped from text input to autocomplete text input.
changes.3: Paperwork Generators - Street Name section swapped from text input to autocomplete text input.
changes.4: Paperwork Generators - District section swapped from text input to autocomplete text input.
changes.5: Paperwork Generators - Section Streetname has been renamed to Street Name.

changes.1: Traffic Report Generator - Automatic crime classification detection and colouring.
changes.2: Traffic Report Generator - Fine section is now optional as not all crimes have fines attached to them.
changes.3: Traffic Report Generator - Crime ID, Title, & Classification section swapped from text input to list input.
changes.4: Traffic Report Generator - Crime Classification section was removed.
changes.5: Traffic Report Generator - Drivers License section swapped from radio input to list input.
changes.6: Traffic Report Generator - Tint Level section swapped from number input to list input.
changes.7: Traffic Report Generator - Certain section titles were renamed. (Tints -> Tint Level, Neighbourhood -> District, Defendant Details, Narrative, & Dashboard Camera -> Defendant & Narrative, Crime ID & Title -> Crime ID, Title, & Classification)
changes.8: Traffic Report Generator - Certain help messages were edited and refined.
